Params: {3: 'That I do not know... I feel as though I am just a tapestry... Torn into individual strands... Strands ripped out and tied to the strands of others...'}
{3: 'I have wept and cried out in agony...'}
{3: 'Yet nothing has freed me from this eternal despair...'}
{3: 'I can only weave this pain into the fibers of my being...'}
{3: "Whether it's love, regret, anger, fear, or hatred..."}
{3: 'Someone... Anyone... Deliver me from it all...'}
